attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We ask the government to honour it's previous pledge to reduce public transport costs. We have one of the most crowded and most expensive public transport systems in the industrialised world. It is bad for the environment and for our society that people are forced into cars or planes due to high fares.

We ask the government to increase subsidies substanially and to reinstate legislation controlling any future fare increases.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
